to O
Windows O
Azure -
Client -
: O
Microsoft O
Corporation O
/ O
Group O
: O
VLIT O
Jan O
2011 O
- O
Oct O
2011 O
Case O
Study O
Featured O
on O
TechNet O
Synopsis O
: O
BCWeb O
is O
a O
Windows O
Azure O
ASP.NET O
Web O
Role O
application O
; O
authenticated O
against O
STS O
using O
Federation O
services O
that O
provide O
a O
set O
of O
Web O
forms O
that O
help O
capture O
price O
exception O
details O
, O
information O
on O
business O
case O
for O
doing O
discounts O
on O
price O
lists O
, O
and O
helps O
calculate O
percentage O
of O
discount O
It O
uses O
the O
ASP.NET O
connector O
and O
custom O
Web O
services O
to O
pull O
real O
- O
time O
price O
information O
from O
SAP O
, O
and O
provides O
sales O
executives O
with O
a O
light O
front O
- O
end O
to O
SAP O
BCWeb O
helps O
simulate O
pricing O
discounts O
, O
manage O
business O
rules O
, O
customize O
routing O
and O
approval O
workflows O
, O
and O
update O
the O
LOB O
data O
stored O
in O
SAP O
One O
of O
the O
major O
goals O
of O
this O
system O
is O
to O
improve O
field O
productivity O
by O
simplifying O
the O
process O
and O
removing O
training O
requirements O
for O
complex O
back O
- O
end O
systems O
, O
in O
this O
case O
SAP O
BCWeb O
integrates O
different O
promotion O
types O
into O
a O
simplified O
Web O
- O
application O
It O
also O
allows O
users O
to O
specify O
business O
rules O
using O
Excel O
2007 O
files O
and O
to O
get O
notifications O
in O
Outlook O
2007 O
Additional O
goals O
of O
this O
system O
include O
: O

• O
Reduce O
revenue O
leakage O
by O
having O
a O
business O
case O
documented O
for O
each O
promotion O
field O


• O
Obtain O
visibility O
decisions O
and O
understand O
who O
required O
a O
discount O
and O
why O


• O
Understand O
promotion O
effectiveness O
and O
ensure O
the O
field O
is O
making O
informed O
decisions O


• O

a O

set O
of O
files O
to O
easily O
change O
empowerment O
guidelines O
by O
having O
a O
single O
master O
data O
of O
workflow O
routing O
and O
approvals O


• O
Specific O
business O
process O
in O
price O
- O
execution O
domain O
, O

, O
pattern O
addresses O
larger O
solutions O
space O

Module O
- O
Man O
Machine O
Language O

MML O
is O
a O
configuration O
tool O
widely O
used O
in O
communication O
equipments O
It O
uses O
Client O
/ O
Server O
architecture O

MML O
server O
communicates O
with O
both O
the O
client O
and O
the O
APP O
in O
the O
equipment O

It O
receives O
MML O
commands O
inputted O
by O
users O

the O
client O
and O
relays O
it O
to O
APP O
to O
process O
it O

processing O
result O
, O
the O
server O
generates O
a O
MML O
report O
and O
sends O
it O
back O
to O
the O
client O
It O
interacts O
with O
other O
system O
modules O
Connection O
Management O
, O
Authorization O
Management O
, O
Command O
Process O
, O

configuration O

/ O
application O

Hornet O

DESCRIPTION O

• O
IPv6 O
, O
formerly O
named O
IPng O
( O
next O
generation O
) O
, O
is O
the O
latest O
version O
of O
the O
Internet O
Protocol O
( O
IP O
) O

IP O
is O
a O
packet O
- O
based O
protocol O
used O
to O
exchange O
data O
, O
voice O
, O
and O
video O
traffic O
over O
digital O
networks O

• O
Cisco O
's O
Wide O
- O
Area O
Application O
Services O
IPv4 O
users O
can O
move O
to O
IPv6 O
and O
receive O
services O
such O
as O
end O
- O
to O
- O
end O
security O
, O
quality O
of O
service O
( O
QoS O
) O
, O
and O
globally O
unique O
addresses O
The O
IPv6 O
address O
space O
reduces O
the O
need O
for O
private O
addresses O
and O
Network O
Address O
Translation O
( O
NAT O
) O
processing O
by O
border O
routers O
at O
network O
edges O


• O
Implementing O
basic O
IPv6 O
connectivity O
in O
the O
Cisco O
IOS O
software O
consists O
of O
assigning O
IPv6 O
addresses O
to O
individual O
router O
interfaces O
The O
forwarding O
of O
IPv6 O
traffic O
can O
be O
enabled O
globally O
, O
and O
Cisco O
Express O
Forwarding O
switching O
for O
IPv6 O
can O

enabled O

• O

primary O
motivation O
for O
IPv6 O
is O

to O

demand O
for O
globally O
unique O
IP O

( O

RELEASES O
LANCER O
, O
PHOENIX O
, O
SKYHAWK O
, O
SPRIT O

DESCRIPTION O

• O
Wide O
Area O
Application O
Services O
( O
WAAS O
) O
is O
a O
Cisco "B-Companies worked at"
Systems "L-Companies worked at"
technology O
that O
improves O
the O
performance O
of O
applications O
on O
a O
wide O
area O
network O
( O
WAN O
) O

WAAS O
combines O
Cisco O
's O
Wide O
Area O
File O
Services O
( O
WAFS O
- O
products O
allow O
remote O
office O
users O
to O
access O
and O
share O
files O
globally O
at O

LAN O
speeds O
over O
the O
WAN O
) O
with O
WAN O
optimization O
inside O
of O
a O
router O
, O
accelerating O
TCP O
- O
based O
applications O
on O
a O
given O
network O


• O
WAAS O
system O
consists O
of O
a O
set O
of O
devices O
called O
wide O
area O
application O
engines O
( O
WAEs O
) O
that O
work O
together O
to O
optimize O
TCP O
traffic O
over O
your O
network O
When O
client O
and O
server O
applications O
attempt O
to O
communicate O
with O
each O
other O
, O
the O
network O
intercepts O
and O
redirects O
this O
traffic O
to O
the O
WAEs O
so O
that O
they O

Project O

US O
EPG O
Forecast O
Workbook O
( O
FWB O
) O
application O
is O
designed O
to O
support O
the O
US O
Enterprise O
Partner O
Group O
( O
US O
EPG O
) O
in O
producing O
and O
maintaining O
the O
monthly O
US O
sales O
forecast O
It O
is O
a O
transactional O
database O
combined O
with O
Microsoft O
Office O
Excel O
functionality O
that O
enables O
end O
users O
to O
interact O
with O
the O
USNAForecast O
database O
Typically O
, O
an O
ATU O
manager O
will O
connect O
to O
the O
corporate O
network O
and O
download O
data O
from O
the O
forecast O
database O
, O
which O
creates O
an O
offline O
forecast O
workbook O
This O
data O
can O
then O
be O
accessed O
offline O
, O
modelled O
, O
and O
changes O
to O
certain O
data O
fields O
are O
subsequently O
uploaded O
back O
to O
the O
forecast O
database O
through O
a O
CorpNet O
connection O
These O
changes O
are O
then O
stored O
in O
the O
online O
database O
and O
subsequently O
loaded O
back O
into O
upstream O
systems O
